name: My Talking Rod
description:
My Talking Rod is a game in which you have to destroy Rod in a variety of ways: blow up, run over by a van, throw apples, throw him off a plane or take him away in a hurricane! Are you ready?

Yawoo Games in VK: https://vk.com/yawoogames

Yawoo Games in YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcdZxD-6c0MRUUp7ZVTNZ3A

Yawoo Games in Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=8714751329860963455

Developer in VK: https://vk.com/egorcoronado

Thanks for playing!

#mytalkingrod
